I’m not eating it because I am a vegetarian.

Do you want to play football / soccer (am.)?
Do you want to visit friends?
I don’t want to arrive late.
I don’t want to go there.
I want to stay at home.

Do you want to eat here?
Do you want to sleep here?

Do you want to stay till tomorrow?
Do you want to pay the bill only tomorrow?
Do you want to go to the disco?
Do you want to go to the cinema?
Do you want to go to a café?

text: You must wait for the taxi.
I want to make a call.
I want to send an email.
Is there a sheet of paper and a pen here?
translate: Burada bir yaprak kağıt ve tükenmez var mı?

text: I didn’t come because I was ill.
She didn’t come because she was tired.
He didn’t come because he wasn’t interested.
We didn’t come because our car is damaged.
They didn’t come because they missed the train.
I didn’t come because I was not allowed to.
I am not coming because the weather is so bad.
translate: Hava çok kötü olduğu için gelmiyorum.

text: He isn’t coming because he isn’t invited.
I am not coming because I have no time.
I am not staying because I still have to work.
I’m going because it is already late.
I was talking on the phone all the time.
I am wearing a blue dress.
I am wearing a red dress.
I am wearing a green dress.
An old lady lives at the top.
translate: Şu yukarda yaşlı bir kadın oturuyor.

text: A fat lady lives at the top.
translate: Şu yukarda şişman bir kadın oturuyor.
Şu aşağıda meraklı bir kadın oturuyor.

text: But the neighbours have naughty children.
He is staying in a hotel.
He is staying in a cheap hotel.
He is reading a boring novel.
She is watching an exciting movie.
Which newspaper did you subscribe to?
I know that – I knew that.
I write that – I wrote that.
I hear that – I heard that.
I’ll get it – I got it.
I’ll bring that – I brought that.
I’ll buy that – I bought that.
translate: Bunu satın alıyorum – bunu satın aldım.

text: I expect that – I expected that.
Why did you become a teacher?
Why did you take a taxi?
I’ll explain that – I explained that.
I know that – I knew that.
She took a piece of chocolate.
He was disloyal, but she was loyal.
translate: O (erkek) sadık değildi, ama o (kadın) sadıktı.

text: He was lazy, but she was hard-working.
He was poor, but she was rich.
He had no money, only debts.
translate: Onun (erkek) parası değil, bilakis borçları vardı.

text: He had no luck, only bad luck.
He had no success, only failure.
He was not satisfied, but dissatisfied.
He was not happy, but sad.
He was not friendly, but unfriendly.
I’m angry that you drink so much beer.
translate: Bu kadar çok bira içmen beni kızdırıyor.

text: I’m angry that you come so late.
translate: Bu kadar geç gelmen beni kızdırıyor.

text: I think he needs a doctor.
translate: Onun bir doktora ihtiyacı olduğunu zannediyorum.

text: I think he is sleeping now.
We hope that he marries our daughter.
We hope that he has a lot of money.
translate: Onun çok parası olduğunu ümit ediyoruz.

text: We hope that he is a millionaire.
I heard that your wife had an accident.
I heard that she is in the hospital.
I heard that your car is completely wrecked.
I’m happy that you are interested.
I’m happy that you want to buy the house.
I’m afraid the last bus has already gone.
I’m afraid we will have to take a taxi.
I’m afraid I have no more money.
You are so lazy – don’t be so lazy!
translate: Çok tembelsin – o kadar tembel olma!

text: You sleep for so long – don’t sleep so late!
You come home so late – don’t come home so late!
translate: Çok geç geliyorsun – o kadar geç gelme!

text: You laugh so loudly – don’t laugh so loudly!
translate: Çok sesli gülüyorsun – o kadar sesli gülme!

text: You speak so softly – don’t speak so softly!
translate: Çok sessiz konuşuyorsun – o kadar sessiz konuşma!

text: You drink too much – don’t drink so much!
translate: Çok fazla içiyorsun – o kadar çok içme!

text: You smoke too much – don’t smoke so much!
translate: Çok fazla sigara içiyorsun – o kadar çok sigara içme!

text: You work too much – don’t work so much!
translate: Çok fazla çalışıyorsun – o kadar çok çalışma!

text: You drive too fast – don’t drive so fast!
translate: Çok hızlı gidiyorsun – o kadar hızlı gitme!

text: I don’t know if he loves me.
I don’t know if he’ll come back.
I don’t know if he’ll call me.
I wonder if he thinks about me.
translate: Onun beni düşünüp düşünmediğini kendime soruyorum.

text: I wonder if he has someone else.
translate: Onun hayatında başka biri olup olmadığını kendime soruyorum.
Onun yalan söyleyip söylemediğini kendime soruyorum.
Acaba onun başka bir sevdiği var mı?

text: Maybe he tells me the truth?
I doubt whether he really likes me.
translate: Onun benden gerçekten hoşlandığından şüphe ediyorum.

text: I doubt whether he’ll write to me.
I doubt whether he’ll marry me.

translate: Acaba o benden gerçekten hoşlanıyor mu?
Bunu satın al! Bunu satın alın!

text: Did you have to call an ambulance?
Did you have to call the doctor?
Did you have to call the police?
Do you have the telephone number? I had it just now.
translate: Sizde telefon numarası var mı? Daha şimdi vardı.

text: Do you have the address? I had it just now.
translate: Sizde adres var mı? Daha şimdi vardı.

text: Do you have the city map? I had it just now.
translate: Sizde şehir planı var mı? Daha şimdi vardı.

text: Did he come on time? He could not come on time.
translate: O, vaktinde geldi mi (erkek için)? Vaktinde gelemedi.

text: Did he find the way? He could not find the way.
translate: O, yolu buldu mu (erkek için)? Yolu bulamadı.

text: Did he understand you? He could not understand me.
translate: O, seni anladı mı (erkek için)? Beni anlayamadı.

text: Why could you not come on time?
Why could you not find the way?
Why could you not understand him?
I could not come on time because there were no buses.
I could not find the way because I had no city map.
translate: Yolu bulamadım çünkü şehir planım yoktu.

text: I could not understand him because the music was so loud.
translate: Onu (erkek için) anlayamadım çünkü müzik çok sesliydi.

text: I had to take a taxi.
I had to buy a city map.
I had to switch off the radio.
Since when is she no longer working?
Yes, she is no longer working since she got married.
translate: Evet, kendisi (kadın) evlendiğinden beri artık çalışmıyor.

text: Since she got married, she’s no longer working.
Since they have met each other, they are happy.
Since they have had children, they rarely go out.
translate: Çocukları olduğundan beri seyrek dışarı çıkıyorlar.

text: She watches TV while she irons.
She listens to music while she does her work.
I can’t see anything when I don’t have glasses.
I can’t understand anything when the music is so loud.
translate: Müzik bu kadar sesli olunca, bir şey anlamıyorum.

text: I can’t smell anything when I have a cold.
We’ll take a taxi if it rains.
We’ll travel around the world if we win the lottery.
We’ll start eating if he doesn’t come soon.
We had to water the flowers.
We had to clean the apartment.
We had to wash the dishes.
Did you have to pay the bill?
Did you have to pay an entrance fee?
Did you have to pay a fine?
Who had to go home early?
Who had to take the train?
We did not want to stay long.
We did not want to drink anything.
We did not want to disturb you.
I just wanted to make a call.
I just wanted to call a taxi.
Actually I wanted to drive home.
I thought you wanted to call your wife.
I thought you wanted to call information.
I thought you wanted to order a pizza.
He fell asleep although the TV was on.
translate: Televizyon açık olduğu halde, o (erkek) uyudu.

text: He stayed a while although it was late.
translate: Geç olduğu halde, o (erkek) daha oturdu.

text: He didn’t come although we had made an appointment.
The TV was on. Nevertheless, he fell asleep.
translate: Televizyon açıktı. O buna rağmen uyudu.

text: It was already late. Nevertheless, he stayed a while.
translate: Geç olmuştu. O buna rağmen daha oturdu.

text: We had made an appointment. Nevertheless, he didn’t come.
Although he has no license, he drives the car.
translate: O, sürücü belgesi olmadığı halde araba kullanıyor.

text: Although the road is slippery, he drives so fast.
translate: O, yol ıslak olduğu halde hızlı gidiyor.

text: Although he is drunk, he rides his bicycle.
translate: O, sarhoş olduğu halde bisiklet ile gidiyor.

text: Despite having no licence / license (am.), he drives the car.
translate: Onun sürücü belgesi yok. Buna rağmen araba kullanıyor.

text: Despite the road being slippery, he drives fast.
translate: Yol ıslak. Buna rağmen çok hızlı gidiyor.

text: Despite being drunk, he rides the bike.
translate: O, sarhoş. Buna rağmen bisiklet ile gidiyor.

text: Although she went to college, she can’t find a job.
translate: O, üniversite bitirdiği halde iş bulamıyor.

text: Although she is in pain, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
translate: O, ağrıları olduğu halde doktora gitmiyor.

text: Although she has no money, she buys a car.
translate: O, parası olmadığı halde araba alıyor.

text: She went to college. Nevertheless, she can’t find a job.
translate: O, üniversite bitirdi. Buna rağmen iş bulamıyor.

text: She is in pain. Nevertheless, she doesn’t go to the doctor.
translate: Onun ağrıları var. Buna rağmen doktora gitmiyor.

text: She has no money. Nevertheless, she buys a car.
translate: Onun parası yok. Buna rağmen bir araba satın alıyor.

text: I’ll wait until my hair is dry.
I’ll wait until the film is over.
I’ll wait until the traffic light is green.
When do you go on holiday?
Yes, before the summer holidays begin.
translate: Evet, yaz tatili başlamadan daha önce.

text: Repair the roof before the winter begins.
Wash your hands before you sit at the table.
Close the window before you go out.
Yes, after the class is over.
After he had an accident, he could not work anymore.
translate: O (erkek) kaza geçirdikten sonra, artık çalışamadı.

text: After he had lost his job, he went to America.
translate: O, (erkek) işini kaybettikten sonra, Amerika’ya gitti.

text: After he went to America, he became rich.
translate: O, (erkek) Amerika’ya gittikten sonra zengin oldu.

text: My son did not want to play with the doll.
My daughter did not want to play football / soccer (am.).
My wife did not want to play chess with me.
My children did not want to go for a walk.
They did not want to tidy the room.
They did not want to go to bed.
He was not allowed to eat ice cream.
He was not allowed to eat chocolate.
He was not allowed to eat sweets.
I was allowed to make a wish.
I was allowed to buy myself a dress.
translate: Kendime bir elbise almama izin vardı.

text: I was allowed to take a chocolate.
Were you allowed to smoke in the airplane?
Were you allowed to drink beer in the hospital?
Were you allowed to take the dog into the hotel?
During the holidays the children were allowed to remain outside late.
translate: Tatilde cocukların uzun süre dışarda kalmalarına izin vardı.

text: They were allowed to play in the yard for a long time.
translate: Avluda uzun süre oynamalarına müsaade vardı.

text: They were allowed to stay up late.
translate: Gece uzun süre uyanık kalmalarına müsaade vardı.

text: Have you already been to Berlin?
translate: Daha evvel hiç Berlin’de bulundunuz mu?

text: No, I don’t know anyone here.
a little longer – not much longer
Will you stay here a little longer?
No, I won’t stay here much longer.
Would you like to drink something else?
No, I don’t want anything else.
translate: Hayır, başka hiç bir şey istemiyorum.

text: No, I haven’t eaten anything yet.

translate: daha başka biri – artık kimse yok

text: Does anyone else want a coffee?
How did you pass the exam?
How did you find the way?
With whom did you make an appointment?
With whom did you celebrate your birthday?
What did you come to know?
I get up as soon as the alarm rings.
I become tired as soon as I have to study.
I will stop working as soon as I am 60.
As soon as I have a moment.
He’ll call, as soon as he has a little time.
I’ll work as long as I can.
I’ll work as long as I am healthy.
He lies in bed instead of working.
She reads the newspaper instead of cooking.
He is at the bar instead of going home.
As far as I know, he lives here.
As far as I know, his wife is ill.
As far as I know, he is unemployed.
I overslept; otherwise I’d have been on time.
I missed the bus; otherwise I’d have been on time.
I didn’t find the way / I got lost; otherwise I’d have been on time.
The button from the shirt is gone.
The boss’ computer is not working.
How do I get to her parents’ house?
The house is at the end of the road.
What is the name of the capital city of Switzerland?
What is the title of the book?
What are the names of the neighbour’s / neighbor’s (am.) children?
What are the doctor’s consultation times?
What time is the museum open?
Perhaps the weather will get better tomorrow.
translate: Hava belki yarın daha iyi olur.

text: The journey was beautiful, but too tiring.
The train was on time, but too full.
The hotel was comfortable, but too expensive.
I hope that it gets better.
He’ll take either the bus or the train.
translate: O, ya otobüs ya da trene binecek.

text: He’ll come either this evening or tomorrow morning.
translate: O, ya bu akşam ya da yarın sabah gelecek.

text: He’s going to stay either with us or in the hotel.
translate: O, ya bizde ya da otelde kalacak.

text: She speaks Spanish as well as English.
translate: O (kadın) hem ispanyolca hem de ingilizce konuşuyor.

text: She has lived in Madrid as well as in London.
translate: O hem Madrid’te hem de Londra’da yaşadı.

text: She knows Spain as well as England.
translate: O hem İspanya’yı hem de İngiltere’yi biliyor.

text: He is not only stupid, but also lazy.
translate: O sadece aptal değil, aynı zamanda tembel.

text: She is not only pretty, but also intelligent.
translate: O sadece güzel değil, aynı zamanda akıllı.

text: Do you know that for sure?
I think that it is old.
The boss definitely has a girlfriend.
translate: Şefin mutlaka bir kız arkadaşı vardır.

text: It is very possible that he has a girlfriend.
She speaks not only German, but also French.
translate: O sadece Almanca değil, aynı zamanda Fransızca da konuşuyor.

text: I can neither play the piano nor the guitar.
translate: Ben ne piyano ne de gitar çalabiliyorum.

text: I can neither waltz nor do the samba.
translate: O ne vals, ne de samba dansı yapabiliyor.

text: I like neither opera nor ballet.
translate: Ne opera ne de bale seviyorum.

text: The faster you work, the earlier you will be finished.
translate: Ne kadar hızlı çalışırsan, o kadar çabuk bitirirsin.

text: The earlier you come, the earlier you can go.
translate: Ne kadar erken gelirsen, o kadar erken gidebilirsin.

text: The older one gets, the more complacent one gets.
translate: İnsan ne kadar yaşlanırsa, o kadar rahat oluyor.
